block.p: ARBESFELD--Arthur (Artie), beloved husband of Sylvia (Vapnek), devoted father of Gail May (Steve) and Mark (Nina), loving grandfather of Ryan, Jaime and Max, brother of Mel, Eileen Glick and the late Norman. Services Tuesday, 12:15pm, ''Sinai Chapels'' 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows, NY. Interment Wellwood Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. Donations may be made to a charity of your choice.
